body: Hey John, Back to the issue just update all your components and try again. For what you want to do you don't need to create it surface by surface. Just send it all together. Honeybee will check every surface for the right type and also will match every window and create it for you. Check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/tlB4pKQX5mj9mRtoecYTlVLa*Qd54AMpW1Sip8hNZyERyaPwJgOIAoKwlZULsEF5mfjHPugHNTlSzdOg5gJNVG691XEF8563/addGlzToSurfaces.png)
